page.title: 15ENTERTAINMENT IN DALBEATTIE
page.content: In 1944 the{Dalbeattie Drama Club} started up.Thirtyfour years later it obtained a place to store costumes and scenery and to act plays.It was one of the buildings at Dalbeattie Primary School that were no longer required by the Education Authority. This is now called " The Birchvale Theatre".It can hold eighty people.The members perform four or five plays a year and one three act play.They meet every Wednesday. The Drama Club invites different drama groups to act at the theatre,for example the Mull Little Theatre and Perth Theatre.It also takes part in the Stewartry Drama Festival every year and is often among the prizewinners.
